dublin_core.dcvalue: This study determined the effectiveness of a commercially produced handheld computer as a prompting system in facilitating the generalization and increasing the probability of long term maintenance of vocational skills by adolescents with moderate intellectual disabilities Four students successfully used the system in learning a task and then generalized the use of the prompting system to complete increasingly more complex tasks Task performance was maintained at a 100 level for up to 9 weeks
Generalized use of a handheld prompting system.
